org.rcsb.mmtf.encoder

Class EncoderUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rcsb.mmtf.encoder.EncoderUtils

  • public class EncoderUtils
extends Object
    A class of static utility functions to aid encoding of data. Convert from StructureDataInterface into a format useable by the MmtfStructure.
    Author:
    Anthony Bradley

        Returns:

      • generateBioassemblies

        public static List<BioAssemblyData> generateBioassemblies(StructureDataInterface structureDataInterface)
        Find the bioassembly information as a list from the StructureDataInterface.
        Parameters:
        structureDataInterface - the interface from where to find the data
        Returns:
        a list of bioassembly information to be stored in the MMTF data structure.
